mapper.select: /* getList */ select br_name, br_classification, name_address, number_address, lat, lon, start_time end_time, closed_day, fee, utilization_fee, holding_number, bikehold_number, bicycle_pump, bicycle_pump_type, bicycle_repairer, agency_phone_number, agency_name, data_date, organization_code, organization_name from bike_rental
